description: The SMD01-1 Dilution Dispenser is mainly used in the laboratory, rather than addressing traditional manual dilution, but instead dispensing liquid samples. SMD01-1 is 5 standard dispensing modes including simple, equal volume, series, pipetting and titration. There are 5 standard dilution modes, universal, different ratios, ratios between test tubes and various reagents. Users can customize it for more complex and personalized dilution and distributed work.
name: SMD01-1 Dilution Dispenser, LongerPump
